pr_title: Add support for .yml files located in work dir or in classpath

timeline.message: Add support for .yml files located in work dir or in classpath

timeline.bodyText: Why serial runner, is there a reason why these tests can't be run in parallel?
timeline.author: jbartok

replies.bodyText: yes, they are creating some files on runtime with the same name so they should be run serially
replies.author: eminn

timeline.bodyText: Bit weird for the tearDown() method to be annotated with @Before... Mistake?
timeline.author: jbartok

replies.bodyText: it should clear out the system property if present, so we also run this method before each run.
replies.author: eminn

timeline.bodyText: Name is quite a mouthful, maybe something shorter?
timeline.author: jbartok

replies.bodyText: Maybe at least leave out the second Config, like YamlJetConfigBuilderResolutionTest? Or even YamlJetConfigResolutionTest? Not sure.
replies.author: jbartok

timeline.bodyText: Same question, can't you run them in parallel?
timeline.author: jbartok
jbartok
